page.name: MHS Comet Cadtes
page.description:
Built upon the values and principles of the military mindset, the Comet Cadets are students working to become better citizens and leaders through class based learning and community involvement. 
Our meetings will have a variety of topics, including;
Military Drill Instruction 
Team Building and Physical Fitness Activities 
Character Development Lessons
Community Service 
Science and Technology Discussion 
Strategy and Critical Thinking Analysis
